name: The Melon Empire
description:
The Melon Empire is a game about making a deadly trek across the swamp to get more watermelon seeds to grow your empire of watermelons. Beware of the water and beware of the ghasts that lurk in the swamp.

Instructions: Navigate through the swamp to find seeds and bring them back to the farm area in which you started. Try to grow as many melons as possible!

Controls:

Left Click - Roll the watermelon forward

Esc - Pause the game
